summary: Page 88 (right side), new chapter 6 'Ofanim B'Kiyum HaMitzvah'. Contains chapter header, grouping header 'ratzon v'hishtokekut', sections 1-4, grouping header 'mekabel', and start of section 5 (continues to next page). Structure is well captured.

issues.description: OCR has 'וברכת שלמה' with a leading vav that may not be part of the sefer name. The image appears to show 'ברכת שלמה - ראדאמסק, וישלח' without the leading vav.
OCR has 'דתקבלו עליכם לעשותה' where the ending word may be 'לעשותם' (plural) rather than 'לעשותה' (singular), based on the image.
